Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Royal Palm Resort in Palm Beach, you'll be on the beach and convenient to Currumbin Beach and Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Surf World Gold Coast and Mallawa Drive Sports Complex.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 150 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring kitchens with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. Rooms have private furnished balconies. Flat-screen televisions with digital programming are available for your entertainment, and DVD players are also provided. Conveniences include phones, as well as microwaves and washers/dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including an outdoor pool, a waterslide, and a spa tub. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and an arcade/game room.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.

When you stay at Royal Palm Resort in Palm Beach, you'll be on the beach and convenient to Currumbin Beach and Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary. This 4-star apartment is within close proximity of Surf World Gold Coast and Mallawa Drive Sports Complex.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Currumbin Beach - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
Currumbin Wildlife Sanctuary - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Surf World Gold Coast - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Mallawa Drive Sports Complex - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
Tugun Beach - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
John Flynn Private Hospital - 3.5 km / 2.1 mi
David Fleay Wildlife Park - 3.8 km / 2.4 mi
Burleigh Head National Park - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Burleigh Beach - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Bilinga Beach - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Kirra Beach - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Border Park Raceway - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Burleigh Golf Club - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
The Strand - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Coolangatta Beach - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for Royal Palm Resort is Gold Coast, QLD (OOL-Coolangatta) - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • The name on the credit card used at check-in to pay for incidentals must be the primary name on the guestroom reservation.
